entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Rain mixed with drizzle overnight. Amount 10 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 early this evening then light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
